About Me

I'm Vyza Shivakumar Reddy, a passionate and detail-oriented developer with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and Engineering, specializing in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. I enjoy building real-world solutions using Python, Flask, React.js, and API integrations.

I have a strong foundation in web development and have created several full-stack projects such as restaurant websites, portfolio sites, chatbots, and automation tools using technologies like the Telegram API, Razorpay, and MySQL. I'm always eager to learn, collaborate, and contribute to impactful projects that make a difference.

  • Databases: MySQL, MongoDB
